Who can recount His descendants? For His life was removed from the earth; cited in Acts 8:32–33.\f* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H5971"\w* \w stricken|strong="H5061"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w My|strong="H3947"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. A Grave Assigned (Matthew 27:57–61; Mark 15:42–47; Luke 23:50–56; John 19:38–42)
